description: Detects usage of system utilities (only grep for now) to discover security software discovery Author: Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Security Software Discovery
query: (process.executable:*\/grep AND process.command_line:(*nessusd* OR *td\-agent* OR *packetbeat* OR *filebeat* OR *auditbeat* OR *osqueryd* OR *cbagentd* OR *falcond*))
